name: Jeff The Square (GameDev Tutorials)
description:
In This Beta Version of Jeff The Square, You Are Jeff. You Have to Find Your Way to the End Goal to Pass The Level While Trying to Not Get Destroyed by Different Types of Enemies Traps, and Spikes. More Instructions are in-game. 

This Game is Made by me, a 12 Year old boy who Loves to Code in a Game Engine Called Unity.

Good Feedback in the Comments Would be Much Appreciated.
